BAD Days

BAD Day 1

Description

Outline

This tutorial session will provide a brief introduction to Data Science and data manipulation using R and the Jupyter notebooks.

Briefly, the topics covered are: * A brief introduction to Data Science * R for exploratory data Analysis * Hands on data: how to produce good graphics

The hands on components of this module are contained in the following tutorials: 1. Day 1 tutorial 2. Comments on probability
